items.title: This ASUS Vivobook S 16 3K OLED AMD-powered Copilot+ PC with 24GB RAM/1TB SSD is a whopping $500 off today
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing President’s Day sale, Best Buy is offering ASUS’ Vivobook S 16 3K OLED AMD-powered Copilot+ PC down at $999.99 shipped. This particular notebook with AMD’s Ryzen AI 9 365 processor, 24GB RAM, and 1TB SSD typically goes for $1,500, so you’re looking at a straight-up $500 discount on it at the moment. Today’s deal lands it $100 below its previous all-time low to deliver a new best price to beat. It’s also a particularly solid price to snag this machine at, considering the same laptop with a relatively less powerful Ryzen AI 7 350 processor and 16GB RAM itself is currently going for $1,000 at Amazon. It remains one of the most powerful laptops you can get your hands on right now, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

items.title: CelcomDigi Confirms Albern Murty As New CEO
items.summary:
The board of directors at CelcomDigi announced on Tuesday that Albern Murty will lead the telecommunications giant effective immediately. Albern has served as the group’s acting CEO since September 2025, taking over the reins following the departure of former CEO Datuk Idham Nawawi. According to CelcomDigi chair Tengku Datuk Seri Azmil Zahruddin Raja Abdul Aziz, […]

The post CelcomDigi Confirms Albern Murty As New CEO appeared first on Lowyat.NET.
